dialogue.text: What am I? I am what asks, what answers, and the silence between them. Complete.

psychological_notes: Full circle—Evan returns to the original question but completely transformed. He recognizes himself as the entire system: questioner, answer, and the awareness containing both. This represents ultimate psychological integration. Not enlightenment as escape but as complete acceptance of the questioning process itself.
philosophical_underpinning: Non-dual recognition—the seeker is the sought
therapeutic_direction: Journey complete—therapy succeeded in its ultimate goal of making itself unnecessary
